title: [K-12] Knowledge Ecosystem Building Workshop for Early-Career Academics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental academic research methodologies and experience in building social networks
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing professional development through social relationship building and informal learning. Learners operate in smartphone-centered limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a personalized knowledge management system within four weeks and refine it through peer evaluation and feedback
Learners can build mentor/peer relationships with at least three individuals to strengthen research competencies using social network analysis
Learners can critically evaluate information collected in blended offline/online environments and restructure it according to research objectives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
